title: Art Design Education Utilizing VR-Based Serious Games for Exploring Rococo Style

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary art theory and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Project-based learning applying Rococo art styles and design principles through VR-based serious games in smartphone-centric constrained environments.

learning_goals: Learners can identify visual elements of the Rococo art style (curves, ornamentation, color) in a VR environment with 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply design principles of the Rococo style to create three or more creative digital works through interactive tasks in a serious game.
Learners can write a case analysis report on the application of the Rococo style to modern design through project-based assessment.

resources: Mobile VR Headsets (Low-Cost Equipment, e.g., Cardboard)
WebGL Build Files Based on Game Engines (Unity/Unreal Engine)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
